member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.BasePlugin.AddComponent``1
member.summary: Add a Component (e.g. MonoBehaviour) into Unity scene. Automatically registers the type with Il2Cpp Type system if it isn't already.
member.typeparam: Type of the component to add.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.IL2CPPChainloader.AddUnityComponent``1
member.summary: Register and add a Unity Component (for example MonoBehaviour) into BepInEx global manager. Automatically registers the type with Il2Cpp type system if it isn't initialised already.
member.typeparam: Type of the component to add.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.IL2CPPChainloader.AddUnityComponent(System.Type)
member.summary: Register and add a Unity Component (for example MonoBehaviour) into BepInEx global manager. Automatically registers the type with Il2Cpp type system if it isn't initialised already.
member.param: Type of the component to add

member.name: E:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.IL2CPPChainloader.PluginLoad
member.summary: Occurs after a plugin is instantiated and just before is called.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.PrincessDumper
member.summary: Provides functionality for runtime dumping of a specified module's memory, including IL2CPP bytes and metadata bytes.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.PrincessDumper.logger
member.summary: The logger used for logging information and errors.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.PrincessDumper.RuntimeDump(System.Byte[]@,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Performs a runtime dump of the specified module's memory and retrieves IL2CPP bytes and metadata bytes.
member.param: Output parameter to store the IL2CPP bytes.
Output parameter to store the metadata bytes.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Unity.IL2CPP.PrincessDumper.ValidateMetadata(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Validates the metadata by checking if the IL2CPP bytes and metadata bytes are the same. If they are the same, it searches for the global-metadata.dat file at the specified path and updates the metadata bytes accordingly. If the file is not found, it prompts the user to input the file path manually.
member.param: The path to the global-metadata.dat file.

member.name: M:Doorstop.Entrypoint.Start
member.summary: The main entrypoint of BepInEx, called from Doorstop.
